channel.title: God's iPod - Free Worship CDs from Chris and Jennie Orange

channel.itunes:author: God's iPod

itunes:owner.itunes:name: God's iPod - Free Worship CDs from Chris and Jennie Orange

channel.itunes:subtitle: Free Worship Music from London
channel.itunes:summary: Hello and welcome to the Emmanuel podcast, a live worship CD from Chris and Jennie Orange in London. Hopefully we've all had those worship times, where the intimacy in the music allows us to feel so close to the throne that we just never want it to end. Listening to this CD over the last week, I'm sure that's exactly how they felt when recording it, you're really going to love this. We're going to be podcasting one track per week, each Wednesday. Now, we're only keeping one track online at a time, so make sure you subscribe now so as not to miss out on any. Enjoy... Visit the CD's website: www.aloudervoice.com

item.title: Emmanuel - 01 We Draw Near
item.dc:creator: podcast@godsipod.com
item.content:encoded:
Discipleship Resources at Whatever You Can Afford prices. DiscipleStuff.com


Click to play the audio...


Hello and welcome to the Emmanuel podcast, a live worship CD from Chris and Jennie Orange in London. Hopefully we've all had those worship times, where the intimacy in the music allows us to feel so close to the throne that we just never want it to end. Listening to this CD over the last week, I'm sure that's exactly how they felt when recording it, you're really going to love this. We're going to be podcasting one track per week, each Wednesday. Now, we're only keeping one track online at a time, so make sure you subscribe now so as not to miss out on any. Enjoy... Visit the CD's website: www.aloudervoice.com

This podcast is free...
However, we have partnered with the charity
'4 Life' so that all donations will go straight to them. Please give generously.
http://www.4lifethailand.org

Add this Podcast to iTunes... or Add this Podcast to my Email...





Get your copy of 21CR on DVD or MP3 download
Nothing compares to watching 21CR on DVD. Bring Winkie Pratney into your living room and share this amazing DNA with your family and small-groups. 21CR is a powerful evangelism tool that gives new believers a rock solid foundation for their walk with God. People often say they have never seen God presented in such a down to earth authentic way. 21CR really will change your life. BUY IT NOW.

item.title: God's iPod Promotional Poster (PDF)
item.dc:creator: podcast@godsipod.com
item.content:encoded:
We now have a God’s iPod Promotional Poster...

You can print this any size you want and put it anywhere you want. Hand them out, whatever you wish to do.

TO DOWNLOAD IT:
Right-Click this link and choose Save to Desktop... God’s iPod Poster.

item.title: God's iPod final podcast
item.dc:creator: podcast@godsipod.com
item.content:encoded:
Click to play the audio and listen as you read along...


Discipleship Resources at Whatever You Can Afford prices. DiscipleStuff.com


March 1st 2009. I am very sorry, but due to the economic conditions, and the plunging donations to God’s iPod, I can no longer afford to continue Gods iPod. Thanks to all who have supported us over the last 4 years, it has been awesome! God’s iPod is #1 on Google and has insanely good brand recognition, the domain name is worth a significant amount, so if some enterprising ministry would like to purchase the domain and all the rights to our name, please contact me. - Israel Anderson.

Update: March 2nd 2009. On discussions with a few people, and shedding some tears, I have put up a fresh donation widget. If we can meet 50% our March budget, I’ll keep going as long we can keep raising half the budget.
